title: League Client lagging (not in-game)
body:
So I recently re-installed windows 10 and then re-installed league of legends. My client somehow is laggy. Like when I accept a game people already start champ select before I even see the champ select. 
I have re-installed league 4 times now. 
I tried to enable low spec mode but it doesn't help. 

This was working before no problem before re-installing league and windows. 
The only difference I can see is before I had the client upgraded from the old one which didn't lag. But when I download it fresh it lags.
All my drivers are updated, is there anything that could fix this or am I stuck with lag?

replies.body: It didn't work I will send a ticket instead. Thank you.

If turning on low spec mode and updating your drivers hasn't been helping at all, I wonder if that client is having problems with some leftover files that weren't deleted successfully. You could try using our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) to run a quick **reinstall and clean uninstall** but keep in mind that this will require fully reinstalling the game again.

If you don't want to run through that installation again, you're welcome to reach out to our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They should be able to provide a little more context as to what's going on!
